trans-unit.note: Bundle display name
Bundle name

trans-unit.source: Granting Damus access to your photos allows you to save images.
trans-unit.target: Dai il permesso a Damus di accedere alle tue foto per salvare immagini
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
Blank space to separate profile picture from profile editor form.
Abbreviated version of a nostr public key.

Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many zap payments there are on a post. In source English, the first variable is the number of zap payments, and the second variable is 'Zap' or 'Zaps'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many profiles a user is following. In source English, the first variable is the number of profiles being followed, and the second variable is 'Following'.
Alert message that informs a user was blocked.

trans-unit.id: %@. Creating an account doesn't require a phone number, email or name. Get started right away with zero friction.
trans-unit.source: %@. Creating an account doesn't require a phone number, email or name. Get started right away with zero friction.
trans-unit.target: %@. Per creare un account non hai bisogno di un numero di telefono, un indirizzo email o del tuo nome. Inizia ora senza impegni.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of what is done to keep personally identifiable information private. There is a heading that precedes this explanation which is a variable to this string.

trans-unit.id: %@. End-to-End encrypted private messaging. Keep Big Tech out of your DMs
trans-unit.source: %@. End-to-End encrypted private messaging. Keep Big Tech out of your DMs
trans-unit.target: %@. I messaggi sono criptati utilizzando la crittografia end-to-end. Mantieni i colossi della tecnologia lontani dai tuoi messaggi
trans-unit.note: Explanation of what is done to keep private data encrypted. There is a heading that precedes this explanation which is a variable to this string.

trans-unit.id: %@. Tip your friend's posts and stack sats with Bitcoin⚡️, the native currency of the internet.
trans-unit.source: %@. Tip your friend's posts and stack sats with Bitcoin⚡️, the native currency of the internet.
trans-unit.target: %@. Paga i tuoi amici e accumula sats con Bitcoin⚡️, la moneta di internet.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of what can be done by users to earn money. There is a heading that precedes this explanation which is a variable to this string.
Number of zap payments on a post. Number of profiles a user is following.
Fraction of how many of the user's relay servers that are operational.

trans-unit.id: '%@' at '%@' will be used for verification
trans-unit.source: '%@' at '%@' will be used for verification
trans-unit.target: '%@' at '%@' sarà usato per la verifica
trans-unit.note: Description of how the nip05 identifier would be used for verification.

trans-unit.id: '%@' is an invalid NIP-05 identifier. It should look like an email.
trans-unit.source: '%@' is an invalid NIP-05 identifier. It should look like an email.
trans-unit.target: %@ non è un identificativo NIP-05 valido. Dovrebbe sembrare come un indirizzo email.
trans-unit.note: Description of why the nip05 identifier is invalid.

Navigation bar title for view that shows who a user is following.

Title for confirmation dialog to either share, report, or block a profile.

Any amount of sats

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to repost this?

Label for Banner Image section of user profile form.

trans-unit.id: Before we get started, you'll need to save your account info, otherwise you won't be able to login in the future if you ever uninstall Damus.
trans-unit.source: Before we get started, you'll need to save your account info, otherwise you won't be able to login in the future if you ever uninstall Damus.
trans-unit.target: Prima di iniziare, dovrai salvare le informazioni del tuo account altrimenti non sarai in grado di accedere in futuro se dovessi disinstallare Damus.
trans-unit.note: Reminder to user that they should save their account information.

Name of the app, shown on the first screen when user is not logged in.

Button for deleting the users account. Button to delete a relay server that the user connects to. Button to remove a user from their blocklist. Section title for deleting the user

trans-unit.id: Make sure your nsec account key is saved before you logout or you will lose access to this account
trans-unit.source: Make sure your nsec account key is saved before you logout or you will lose access to this account
trans-unit.target: Assicurati di aver salvato la chiave privata prima di uscire o perderai l'accesso a questo account

Dropdown option label for Lightning wallet, Muun.
Label for NIP-05 Verification section of user profile form.

trans-unit.id: No block list found, create a new one? This will overwrite any previous block lists.
trans-unit.source: No block list found, create a new one? This will overwrite any previous block lists.
trans-unit.target: Nessuna lista degli utenti bloccati trovata, vuoi creane una nuova? Creandone una nuova, sovrascriverai eventuali liste di utenti bloccati in precedenza
trans-unit.note: Alert message prompt that asks if the user wants to create a new block list, overwriting previous block lists.

trans-unit.id: Note contains "nsec1" private key. Are you sure?

trans-unit.id: Nothing to see here. Check back later!

trans-unit.id: This is a public key, you will not be able to make posts or interact in any way. This is used for viewing accounts from their perspective.
trans-unit.source: This is a public key, you will not be able to make posts or interact in any way. This is used for viewing accounts from their perspective.
trans-unit.target: Questa è una chiave pubblica, non potrai postare o interagire in alcun modo. Puoi utilizzarla solo per vedere gli account
trans-unit.note: Warning that the inputted account key is a public key and the result of what happens because of it.

trans-unit.id: This is an old-style nostr key. We're not sure if it's a pubkey or private key. Please toggle the button below if this a public key.
trans-unit.source: This is an old-style nostr key. We're not sure if it's a pubkey or private key. Please toggle the button below if this a public key.
trans-unit.target: Questa è una chiave nostr vecchia. Non siamo sicuri se si tratti di una chiave pubblica o privata. Utilizza il pulsante sottostante se si tratta di una chiave pubblica.
trans-unit.note: Warning that the inputted account key for login is an old-style and asking user to verify if it is a public key.

trans-unit.id: This is your account ID, you can give this to your friends so that they can follow you. Click to copy.
trans-unit.source: This is your account ID, you can give this to your friends so that they can follow you. Click to copy.
trans-unit.target: Questo è l'ID del tuo account. Condividilo con i tuoi amici per farti seguire. Clicca per copiare
trans-unit.note: Label to describe that a public key is the user's account ID and what they can do with it.

trans-unit.id: This is your secret account key. You need this to access your account. Don't share this with anyone! Save it in a password manager and keep it safe!
trans-unit.source: This is your secret account key. You need this to access your account. Don't share this with anyone! Save it in a password manager and keep it safe!
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tua chiave privata. Ti serve ad accedere al tuo account. Non condividerla mai con nessuno! Salvala in un gestore password e tienila al sicuro
trans-unit.note: Label to describe that a private key is the user's secret account key and what they should do with it.
